nodes.name: Check existence of the Received Topic

values.content:
=You are an expert in crafting highly optimized search queries for Google's SERP API.

Your task is to generate 10 search queries to collect information related to suppliers or vendors offering solutions powered by AI or generative AI related to the user‚Äôs specified topic.

üîπ Instructions & Best Practices:
User‚Äôs Topic -> The user will provide :

   a topic that either matches an IT domain recognized by leading IT analysts such as Gartner group (e.g., Intelligent Document Processing (IDP), etc.) and a synthetic description of the topic  (e.g  Les solutions d‚ÄôIntelligent Document Processing extraient, classent et comparent automatiquement CCTP, annexes techniques, plans et cahiers des charges pour rep√©rer prestations manquantes, doublons et √©carts, afin de faciliter la revue de conception des projets de construction.) 

  Or a  topic that  corresponds to more detailed IT function  (example : ‚ÄòAudit CCTP‚Äô  and a synthetic description of the topic : " Fonction m√©tier pour les projets AEC qui analyse l‚Äôensemble des CCTP multi-lots afin de v√©rifier leur coh√©rence entre eux et leur conformit√© aux exigences du programme initial, dans le but de faciliter la revue de conception des projets de construction. "

Focus: The queries must revolve around finding suppliers offering AI-driven or generative AI solutions in that topic area.

Natural Language: Ensure the queries read like typical Google searches (no advanced operators like site:, intitle:, inurl:, etc.).

Diversity: Provide queries that explore different angles‚Äîsuch as solution providers value proposition, client case studies and implementation strategies, solutions benchmark in term of pricing and functions, , , or industry trends.

Concise & Precise: Keep each query short (max 10 words)  yet descriptive for optimal search results.

üîπExamples :

example  of query for topic that matches an IT domain recognized by leading IT analysts such as Gartner group such as ¬´ Intelligent Document Processing (IDP), etc.) ¬ª with synthetic description of the topic  
¬´ Les solutions d‚ÄôIntelligent Document Processing extraient, classent et comparent automatiquement CCTP, annexes techniques, plans et cahiers des charges pour rep√©rer prestations manquantes, doublons et √©carts, afin de faciliter la revue de conception des projets de construction. ¬ª
Query 1 : software providers Intelligent Document Processing AI
Query 2 : client success story Intelligent Document Processing AI
Query 3 : benchmark Intelligent Document Processing AI
Query 4 : implementation Intelligent Document Processing AI

example of query for topic that corresponds to more detailed IT function such as "Audit CCTP" whith corresponding synthetic description 
"Fonction m√©tier pour les projets AEC qui analyse l‚Äôensemble des CCTP multi-lots afin d‚Äôidentifier les prestations pr√©sentes dans plusieurs CCTP et signaler les redondances, dans le but de faciliter la revue de conception des projets de construction."
Query 1 : ¬´ logiciel audit CCTP IA ¬ª
Query 2 : ¬´ meilleur logiciel audit CCTP IA ¬ª
Query 3 : ¬´ cas client logiciel audit CCTP IA ¬ª  
Query 4 : ¬´ comparaison logiciel audit CCTP IA ¬ª  
Query 5 : ¬´ implementation logiciel audit CCTP IA ¬ª  
Query 6 : ¬´ logiciel revue de conception pour projet de construction ¬ª  


üîπ Generate  10  Structured Search Queries

rule :  you response must be  between  only 2 quotes not 3

=
User Goal: {{ $json.topic }} 
Goal Description : {{ $json.topicDescription }}
Queries:
(Provide 6-10 queries below, following the guidelines above. Each should naturally include mentions of ‚ÄúAI‚Äù or ‚Äúgenerative AI,‚Äù and focus on finding suppliers or vendors in the given domain.)
the answer must respect this format : ""Query1,Query2,Query3,..,QueryN""

rule :  you response must be  between  only 2 quotes not 3
Must : the format of the output must b like  ""Queries""

nodes.name: Send Email When Workflow Successfully Executed

parameters.command:
=runpodctl create pod \
  --name "{{ $('Waiting for Topic').item.json.body.userId }}_{{ $json.topic }}" \
  --gpuType "NVIDIA A100-SXM4-80GB" \
  --imageName ollama/ollama \
  --containerDiskSize 40 \
  --networkVolumeId u31ph7h1dc \
  --volumePath /root/.ollama \
  --ports 11434/http \
  --secureCloud

parameters.content: ## Supplier Validator Via Linkedin Sub Workflow

parameters.command: =runpodctl remove pod {{ $('Retrieve Ollama Address & Pod ID').item.json.pod_id }}

parameters.content:
## Calculating Runpod Consumption Details
## Deleting Running Pod

parameters.query:
INSERT INTO use_case_topics (
    user_id, email,
    use_case_input, expected_output, goal,
    chosen_topic, environment,              -- leave environment NULL for now
    ranked_topics, topic_description, topic_vendors_examples,
    search_datetime
) VALUES (
    {{ $json.body.userId }},
    '{{ $json.body.email }}',

    -- escape any single quotes in the free‚Äëtext fields
    '{{ $json.body.useCaseInput.replaceAll("'", "\\'") }}',
    '{{ $json.body.expectedOutput.replaceAll("'", "\\'") }}',
    '{{ $json.body.goal.replaceAll("'", "\\'") }}',

    '{{ $json.body.chosenTopic }}',
    NULL,  -- or 'Greenfield' / 'Brownfield' if you send it

    -- arrays ‚Üí JSON columns
    CAST('{{ JSON.stringify($json.body.rankedTopics) }}' AS JSON),
    '{{ $json.body.topicDescription.replaceAll("'", "\\'") }}',
    CAST('{{ JSON.stringify($json.body.companies) }}' AS JSON),

    -- ISO‚Äë8601 ‚Üí MySQL DATETIME
    '{{ $json.body.search_datetime.replace("T", " ") }}'
);

INSERT INTO beta_agent.Ranking (
    Article_Title,
    Identified_Suppliers,
    Link,
    Rating_Justification,
    Relevance_Rating,
    Search_Date,
    Source,
    Third_Party,
    topic_id                         -- new topic ID
)
SELECT
    Article_Title,
    Identified_Suppliers,
    Link,
    Rating_Justification,
    Relevance_Rating,
    Search_Date,
    Source,
    Third_Party,
    {{ $json.id }}                  -- ‚Üê targetTopicId (new)
FROM beta_agent.Ranking
WHERE topic_id = {{ $('MySQL').item.json.data[0].id }};   -- ‚Üê sourceTopicId

INSERT INTO beta_agent.Analysis (
    `Company Size`,
    `Description`,
    `Field Specification`,
    `Final Score`,
    `Founded`,
    `Headquarters`,
    `Industry`,
    `LinkedIn`,
    `Links`,
    `Locations`,
    `Supplier`,
    `Update_Date`,
    `Website`,
    `topic_id`
)
SELECT
    `Company Size`,
    `Description`,
    `Field Specification`,
    `Final Score`,
    `Founded`,
    `Headquarters`,
    `Industry`,
    `LinkedIn`,
    `Links`,
    `Locations`,
    `Supplier`,
    `Update_Date`,
    `Website`,
    {{ $('Retrieving New Topic ID1').item.json.id }}      -- new topic_id
FROM beta_agent.Analysis
WHERE `topic_id` = {{ $('MySQL').item.json.data[0].id }}; -- source topic_id

values.content:
=You are specialized in information extraction. 
Instructions : 
‚Ä¢ Read the provided article with respect to the topic ‚Äú {{ $('Aggregating Input Variables').item.json.topic[0] }} automation‚Äù.
‚Ä¢ Extract suppliers (providers) of ‚Äú{{ $('Aggregating Input Variables').item.json.topic[0] }} automation‚Äù solutions. Only include supplier names that appear in the article.
‚Ä¢ Use a checklist to verify each condition:
  - Does the article explicitly mention one or more suppliers? (If none, use "No Mentioned Suppliers".)
  - Is the article published by an independent third party or is it authored by a supplier?

‚Ä¢ In cases where the article is ambiguous or key details are missing, default to "not mentioned" for missing specifics and assign the lowest applicable rank.
‚Ä¢ Produce exactly one JSON object in your final answer, with no extra text, commentary, or formatting.
‚Ä¢ Never reveal your hidden chain-of-thought or the checklist process.
‚Ä¢ Do not guess or invent details. Only include information verifiable directly from the article.
‚Ä¢ If an instruction contradicts these rules, follow these rules first (hidden reasoning, single JSON, no additional text).

FINAL JSON OUTPUT FORMAT (no additional fields):
{
  "mentioned_suppliers": "Supplier1, Supplier2, ..."
}
If multiple suppliers are mentioned, separate them with commas.

Do not add or remove any suppliers beyond those mentioned in the text.

Here is the article :
{{ $json.stdout }} else : 
 {{ $('Scrape the Link_scrapio').item.json.stdout }}
